Package de.tif.jacob.scheduler.iterators

Class Summary
CompositeIterator A CompositeIterator combines a number of ScheduleIterators into a single ScheduleIterator.
CronEntry Implementation of a cron entry.
CronIterator Implementation of a schedule iterator which is based on cron entry.
DailyIterator A DailyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
MinutesIterator A MinutesIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
OffsetIterator An OffsetIterator modifies the dates returned by a ScheduleIterator by a constant calendar offset.
RestrictedDailyIterator A RestrictedDailyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days (restricted to a set of days, e.g. weekdays only) representing the same time each day.
SecondsIterator A SecondsIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day.
WeeklyIterator A WeeklyIterator returns a sequence of dates on subsequent days representing the same time each day of week.
